## EdgeResponsePatternDelayed

### EdgeResponsePatternDelayed Globally
```
Globally, it is always the case that once "R" becomes satisfied, "Q" holds after at most "5" time units
```

#### Countertraces
```
true;⌈!R⌉;⌈(!Q && R)⌉;⌈!Q⌉ ∧ ℓ > 5;true
```
